title: How should members earn SGS Tokens?
body:
So far the DAO has 5 members. These 5 people hold the token. All together currently 16 wallets hold SGS token and only 5 are here to use their tokens to vote. 

To give members incentives to be more active in the guild I would like to make a time requirement for members to meet before they could claim tokens. As well as a certain role in the server that would signify they had made a certain number of posts or more.

These are the possible options I had envisioned.

1. A member of the guild for at least 2 months / 100 or more posts in the guild

2. A member of the guild for 4 months / 200 or more posts in the guild

3. A member of the guild for 6 months / 200 or more posts in the guild
author: 0x233A0cb80cC70Bf36Db8025601C9186CAea4CAce
